Structs/Rules/UpdatePromptFrequency.html.name: immediately
Structs/Rules/UpdatePromptFrequency.html.abstract: Version check performed every time the app is launched.

Structs/Rules/AlertType.html#/s:5Siren5R.name: force
Structs/Rules/AlertType.html#/s:5Siren5R.abstract: Forces the user to update your app (1 button alert).

Structs/Rules/AlertType.html#/s:5Siren5R.name: option
Structs/Rules/AlertType.html#/s:5Siren5R.abstract: Presents the user with option to update app now or at next launch (2 button alert).

Structs/Rules/AlertType.html#/s:5Siren5R.name: skip
Structs/Rules/AlertType.html#/s:5Siren5R.abstract: Presents the user with option to update the app now, at next launch, or to skip this version all together (3 button alert).

Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV8anno.name: annoying
Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV8anno.abstract: Performs a version check immediately, but allows the user to skip updating the app until the next time the app becomes active.

Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV8crit.name: critical
Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV8crit.abstract: Performs a version check immediately and forces the user to update the app.

Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV7defa.name: default
Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV7defa.abstract: Performs a version check once a day, but allows the user to skip updating the app until

Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV10per.name: persistent
Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV10per.abstract: Performs a version check daily, but allows the user to skip updating the app until the next time the app becomes active.

Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV7rela.name: relaxed
Structs/Rules.html#/s:5Siren5RulesV7rela.abstract: Performs a version check weekly, but allows the user to skip updating the app until

Structs/Rules/AlertType.html.name: AlertType
Structs/Rules/AlertType.html.abstract: Determines the type of alert to present after a successful version check has been performed.

Structs/Rules/UpdatePromptFrequency.html.name: UpdatePromptFrequency
Structs/Rules/UpdatePromptFrequency.html.abstract: Determines the frequency in which the user is prompted to update the app

Structs/Results.html#/s:5Siren7ResultsV1.name: alertAction
Structs/Results.html#/s:5Siren7ResultsV1.abstract: The UIAlertAction the user chose upon being presented with the update alert.

Structs/Results.html#/s:5Siren7ResultsV1.name: localization
Structs/Results.html#/s:5Siren7ResultsV1.abstract: The Siren-supported locale that was used for the string in the update alert.

Structs/Results.html#/s:5Siren7ResultsV1.name: lookupModel
Structs/Results.html#/s:5Siren7ResultsV1.abstract: The Swift-mapped API model, if a successful version check was performed.

Structs/Results.html#/s:5Siren7ResultsV1.name: updateType
Structs/Results.html#/s:5Siren7ResultsV1.abstract: The type of update that was returned for the API.

Structs/LookupModel/Results.html#/s:5Sir.name: currentVersionReleaseDate
Structs/LookupModel/Results.html#/s:5Sir.abstract: The release date for the latest verison of the app.

Structs/LookupModel/Results.html#/s:5Sir.name: minimumOSVersion
Structs/LookupModel/Results.html#/s:5Sir.abstract: The minimum verison of iOS that the current verison of the app requires.

Structs/LookupModel/Results.html#/s:5Sir.name: releaseNotes
Structs/LookupModel/Results.html#/s:5Sir.abstract: The releases notes from the latest version of the app.

Structs/LookupModel.html#/s:5Siren11Look.name: results
Structs/LookupModel.html#/s:5Siren11Look.abstract: The array of results objects from the iTunes Lookup API.

Structs/LookupModel/Results.html.name: Results
Structs/LookupModel/Results.html.abstract: The Results object from the the iTunes Lookup API.

Structs/Localization/Language.html.name: Language
Structs/Localization/Language.html.abstract: Determines the available languages in which the update message and alert button titles should appear.

Structs/Localization.html#/s:5Siren12Loc.name: alertMessage(forCurrentAppStoreVersion:)
Structs/Localization.html#/s:5Siren12Loc.abstract: The localized string for the UIAlertController‘s message field. .

Structs/Localization.html#/s:5Siren12Loc.name: alertTitle()
Structs/Localization.html#/s:5Siren12Loc.abstract: The localized string for the UIAlertController‘s title field. .

Structs/Localization.html#/s:5Siren12Loc.name: skipButtonTitle()
Structs/Localization.html#/s:5Siren12Loc.abstract: The localized string for the Skip this version UIAlertAction.

Structs/AlertConstants.html#/s:5Siren14A.name: alertMessage
Structs/AlertConstants.html#/s:5Siren14A.abstract: The text that conveys the message that there is an app update available

Structs/AlertConstants.html#/s:5Siren14A.name: alertTitle
Structs/AlertConstants.html#/s:5Siren14A.abstract: The alert title which defaults to Update Available.

Structs/AlertConstants.html#/s:5Siren14A.name: nextTimeButtonTitle
Structs/AlertConstants.html#/s:5Siren14A.abstract: The button text that conveys the message that the user should be prompted to update next time the app launches.

Structs/AlertConstants.html#/s:5Siren14A.name: skipButtonTitle
Structs/AlertConstants.html#/s:5Siren14A.abstract: The text that conveys the message that the the user wants to skip this verison update.

Structs/AlertConstants.html#/s:5Siren14A.name: updateButtonTitle
Structs/AlertConstants.html#/s:5Siren14A.abstract: The button text that conveys the message that the user would like to update the app right away.

Structs/RulesManager.html#/s:5Siren12Rul.name: init(majorUpdateRules:minorUpdateRules:patchUpdateRules:revisionUpdateRules:showAlertAfterCurrentVersionHasBeenReleasedForDays:)
Structs/RulesManager.html#/s:5Siren12Rul.abstract: Initializer that sets update-specific Rules for all updates (e.g., major, minor, patch, revision).

Structs/RulesManager.html#/s:5Siren12Rul.name: init(globalRules:showAlertAfterCurrentVersionHasBeenReleasedForDays:)
Structs/RulesManager.html#/s:5Siren12Rul.abstract: Initializer that sets the same update Rules for all types of updates (e.g., major, minor, patch, revision).

Structs/RulesManager/UpdateType.html.name: UpdateType
Structs/RulesManager/UpdateType.html.abstract: Informs Siren of the type of update that is available so that

Structs/APIManager.html#/s:5Siren10APIMa.name: init(countryCode:)
Structs/APIManager.html#/s:5Siren10APIMa.abstract: Initializes APIManager to the region or country of an App Store in which the app is available.

Structs/AlertConstants.html.name: AlertConstants
Structs/AlertConstants.html.abstract: The default constants used for the update alert’s messaging.

Structs/LookupModel.html.name: LookupModel
Structs/LookupModel.html.abstract: Model representing a selection of results from the iTunes Lookup API.

Structs/Results.html.name: Results
Structs/Results.html.abstract: The relevant metadata returned from Siren upon completing a successful version check.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: appStoreAppIDFailure
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: Error retrieving trackId as the JSON does not contain a ‘trackId’ key.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: appStoreDataRetrievalEmptyResults
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: Error retrieving App Store data as JSON results were empty. Is your app available in the US? If not, change the countryCode variable to fix this error.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: appStoreDataRetrievalFailure(underlyingError:)
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: Error retrieving App Store data as an error was returned.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: appStoreOSVersionUnsupported
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: The version of iOS on the device is lower than that of the one required by the app verison update.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: appStoreVersionArrayFailure
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: Error retrieving App Store verson number as the JSON does not contain a version key.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: currentVersionReleaseDate
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: The currentVersionReleaseDate key is missing in the JSON payload. Please leave an issue on https://github.com/ArtSabintsev/Siren with as many details as possible.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: malformedURL
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: One of the iTunes URLs used in Siren is malformed. Please leave an issue on https://github.com/ArtSabintsev/Siren with as many details as possible.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: missingBundleID
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: Please make sure that you have set a Bundle Identifier in your project.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: recentlyPrompted
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: Siren will not present an update alert if it performed one too recently. If you would like to present an alert every time Siren is called, please consider setting the UpdatePromptFrequency.immediately rule in RulesManager

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: releasedTooSoon(daysSinceRelease:releasedForDays:)
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: The app has been released for X days, but Siren cannot prompt the user until Y (where Y > X) days have passed.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: skipVersionUpdate(installedVersion:appStoreVersion:)
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: The user has opted to skip updating their current version of the app to the current App Store version.

Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.name: localizedDescription
Enums/KnownError.html#/s:5Siren10KnownEr.abstract: The localized description for each error handled by Siren.

Enums/AlertAction.html#/s:5Siren11AlertA.name: appStore
Enums/AlertAction.html#/s:5Siren11AlertA.abstract: The user clicked on the Update option, which took them to the app’s App Store page.

Enums/AlertAction.html#/s:5Siren11AlertA.name: nextTime
Enums/AlertAction.html#/s:5Siren11AlertA.abstract: The user clicked on the Next Time option, which dismissed the alert.

Enums/AlertAction.html#/s:5Siren11AlertA.name: skip
Enums/AlertAction.html#/s:5Siren11AlertA.abstract: The user clicked on the Skip this version option, which dismissed the alert.

Enums/AlertAction.html#/s:5Siren11AlertA.name: unknown
Enums/AlertAction.html#/s:5Siren11AlertA.abstract: (Default) The user never chose an option. This is returned when an error is thrown by Siren.

Enums/AlertAction.html.name: AlertAction
Enums/AlertAction.html.abstract: The UIAlertController button that was pressed upon being presented an update alert.

Enums/KnownError.html.name: KnownError
Enums/KnownError.html.abstract: Enumerates all potentials errors that Siren can handle.

Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC14Results.name: ResultsHandler
Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC14Results.abstract: Return results or errors obtained from performing a version check with Siren.

Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC6sharedAB.name: shared
Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC6sharedAB.abstract: The Siren singleton. The main point of entry to the Siren library.

Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC10apiMana.name: apiManager
Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC10apiMana.abstract: The manager that controls the App Store API that is

Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC19present.name: presentationManager
Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC19present.abstract: The manager that controls the update alert’s string localization and tint color.

Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC12rulesMa.name: rulesManager
Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC12rulesMa.abstract: The manager that controls the type of alert that should be displayed

Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC4wail10co.name: wail(completion:)
Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC4wail10co.abstract: This method executes the Siren version checking and alert presentation flow.

Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC14launchA.name: launchAppStore()
Classes/Siren.html#/s:5SirenAAC14launchA.abstract: Launches the AppStore in two situations when the user clicked the Update button in the UIAlertController modal.
